== Main Inclusion Report for wlassistant ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/w/wlassistant/, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Replaces kwifimanager in Kubuntu, works much better as a wireless network manager (until knetwork manager is default)
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** Runs as root through kdesu
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No Debian Bugs http://bugs.debian.org/wlassistant
** Active upstream.
** No bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=134488&atid=730104|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** cdbs packaging and patch system, uses scons build system
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
